abilities.name: Angelic Weapons.
abilities.description: The deva's weapon attacks are magical. When the deva hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 4d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The deva's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). The deva can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:
At will: detect evil and good
1/day each: commune, raise dead

abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: The deva has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
